00012 using febird::ushort;

00016 template<typename T> class izene_serialization_febird {
00017         NativeDataOutput<AutoGrownMemIO> oa;    
00018 public:
00019         izene_serialization_febird(const T& dat) {
00020                 oa & dat;
00021         }
00022         void write_image(char* &ptr, unsigned int& size) {              
00023                 ptr = (char*)oa.getStream()->begin();
00024                 size = oa.getStream()->tell();
00025         }
00026 
00027 };
00028 
00029 template<typename T> class izene_deserialization_febird {
00030         NativeDataInput<MemIO> ia;
00031 public:
00032         izene_deserialization_febird(const char* ptr,  const size_t size) {
00033                 ia.set((void*)ptr, size);
00034                 //ia.write(ptr, size);
00035         }
00036         void read_image(T& dat) {
00037                 ia & dat;
00038         }
00039 };
